attributes.action: Give asylum to persecuted Pakistani Christian Asia Bibi and her family.
attributes.additional_details:
Below is a link to a BBC article that will provide much greater detail.
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-46085577
attributes.background: Asia Bibi was convicted of blasphemy in 2010. She has spent the last eight years in prison. Recently the Pakistani supreme court overturned her conviction on the basis of insufficient evidence against her. This has led to widespread protests in Pakistan calling for Mrs Bibi's execution.
